mapper.sql: id AS "id" , order_id AS "orderId" , bsi_task_code AS "bsiTaskCode" , bsi_task_status AS "bsiTaskStatus" , bsi_phone_model_id AS "bsiPhoneModelId" , bsi_product_id AS "bsiProductId" , imei AS "imei" , bsi_benef_id_typ AS "bsiBenefIdTyp" , bsi_benef_id_number AS "bsiBenefIdNumber" , bsi_benef_birthday AS "bsiBenefBirthday" , bsi_benef_sex AS "bsiBenefSex" , bsi_benef_name AS "bsiBenefName" , bsi_benef_mobile_number AS "bsiBenefMobileNumber" , bsi_cash_coupon_code AS "bsiCashCouponCode" , bsi_insurance_code AS "bsiInsuranceCode" , exec_times AS "execTimes" , max_exec_times AS "maxExecTimes" , last_exec_err_code AS "lastExecErrCode" , last_exec_err_msg AS "lastExecErrMsg" , last_exec_date AS "lastExecDate" , schedule_exec_date AS "scheduleExecDate" , current_exec_computer AS "currentExecComputer" , current_exec_process_id AS "currentExecProcessId" , current_exec_start_date AS "currentExecStartDate" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_date AS "deleteDate"

sql.set: id = #{id}, order_id = #{orderId}, bsi_task_code = #{bsiTaskCode}, bsi_task_status = #{bsiTaskStatus}, bsi_phone_model_id = #{bsiPhoneModelId}, bsi_product_id = #{bsiProductId}, imei = #{imei}, bsi_benef_id_typ = #{bsiBenefIdTyp}, bsi_benef_id_number = #{bsiBenefIdNumber}, bsi_benef_birthday = #{bsiBenefBirthday}, bsi_benef_sex = #{bsiBenefSex}, bsi_benef_name = #{bsiBenefName}, bsi_benef_mobile_number = #{bsiBenefMobileNumber}, bsi_cash_coupon_code = #{bsiCashCouponCode}, bsi_insurance_code = #{bsiInsuranceCode}, exec_times = #{execTimes}, max_exec_times = #{maxExecTimes}, last_exec_err_code = #{lastExecErrCode}, last_exec_err_msg = #{lastExecErrMsg}, last_exec_date = #{lastExecDate}, schedule_exec_date = #{scheduleExecDate}, current_exec_computer = #{currentExecComputer}, current_exec_process_id = #{currentExecProcessId}, current_exec_start_date = #{currentExecStartDate}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_date = #{deleteDate},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_svp_bsi_order_detail ( id, order_id, bsi_task_code, bsi_task_status, bsi_phone_model_id, bsi_product_id, imei, bsi_benef_id_typ, bsi_benef_id_number, bsi_benef_birthday, bsi_benef_sex, bsi_benef_name, bsi_benef_mobile_number, bsi_cash_coupon_code, bsi_insurance_code, exec_times, max_exec_times, last_exec_err_code, last_exec_err_msg, last_exec_date, schedule_exec_date, current_exec_computer, current_exec_process_id, current_exec_start_date, create_date, update_date, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{bsiTaskCode}, #{bsiTaskStatus}, #{bsiPhoneModelId}, #{bsiProductId}, #{imei}, #{bsiBenefIdTyp}, #{bsiBenefIdNumber}, #{bsiBenefBirthday}, #{bsiBenefSex}, #{bsiBenefName}, #{bsiBenefMobileNumber}, #{bsiCashCouponCode}, #{bsiInsuranceCode}, #{execTimes}, #{maxExecTimes}, #{lastExecErrCode}, #{lastExecErrMsg}, #{lastExecDate}, #{scheduleExecDate}, #{currentExecComputer}, #{currentExecProcessId}, #{currentExecStartDate}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteDate} )
